name: Stagnatum
description:
*Note: The game may take a minute to load.*

You play as Stagnatum, a young stag who is tasked with clearing out a forest of evil spirits. Little does he know that his life will be looping in a strange way...

  • Survive 10 revolutions of a looping forest.
  • Battle enemies.
  • Discover the truth in the end.

Created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 47 Jam. The theme was "Stuck in a loop". 

Controls
  • Arrow Keys or WASD to move
  • Space to jump
  • Z or click to attack
Credits
  • Vu Ha - Code
  • Rose Peng - Art
  • Johan Soriao - Music
Links
  • Ludum Dare 47 Game Page
  • Soundtrack (Soundcloud / free download!)
